long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pulse is a chrome extension that allows web3 community members to build and grow collective knowledge within a shared Community feed. Simply explore the web and when you come across an article, video or image that you'd like to share with your community, open the Pulse chrome extension and click 'Share' to send your Pulse on-chain and into your Community Feed.
